events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department, specifically for the software developer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate’s process and coordinate the next steps in this engineering position.
The initial phone screening with the candidate was completed successfully, discussing their software engineering experience and skills.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening follow-up and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding with technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their software development and engineering problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance in coding and system design questions relevant to the role.
The HR interview has been arranged to discuss the candidate’s overall fit, work culture preferences, and benefits expectations.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication skills and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including salary details, benefits, and expected start date for the software engineering position.
The candidate has accepted the job offer enthusiastically and is ready to begin the onboarding process as a new software engineer.
Onboarding activities have officially started, and the new engineer is being introduced to the team and company tools.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
